title: Error while opening rdp or telnet
author: akadir2121
body_snippet:
Couldn't add panel
The type initializer for 'Crownwood.Magic.Controls.TabControl' threw an exception.

iterations.description: Investigate and fix errors occurring during the initialization or establishment of RDP and Telnet connections, potentially related to ActiveX control handling or external tool configuration.

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Investigate and fix errors occurring during the initialization or establishment of RDP and Telnet connections, potentially related to ActiveX control handling or external tool configuration.
Approach: Debug the connection initiation flow for both RDP and Telnet protocols. This will involve examining how connection parameters are used, how external tools (like PuTTY for Telnet) are invoked, and how RDP ActiveX controls are initialized and interact with the system. Special attention will be paid to error handling and logging during connection establishment.
